1using System;
2using System.Collections.Generic;
3using System.Linq;
4using System.Text;
5using System.Threading.Tasks;

7using System.Windows.Controls;
8using System.Windows.Data;
9using System.Windows.Documents;
10using System.Windows.Input;
11using System.Windows.Media;
12using System.Windows.Media.Imaging;
13using System.Windows.Shapes;
14using Y.Model;
15using Y.Negoci;
16
17namespace Y.Vista
18{
22 public partial class Publicar : Window
23 {
24 private UsuariModel usuari;
25 private bool placeholderTitol;
26 private bool placeholderContingut;
27 private bool placeholderEtiquetes;
32 public Publicar(UsuariModel u)
33 {
34 InitializeComponent();
35 usuari = u;
36 placeholderContingut = true;
37 placeholderEtiquetes = true;
38 placeholderTitol = true;
39 BtnPublicar.IsEnabled = false;
40 }
46 private void BtnPublicar_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
47 {
48 // Publicar un article modifica les bases de dades PUBLICACIO, TAG i TAGPUBLICACIO
49 // AFEGIM PUBLICACIO
50 PublicacioModel p = new PublicacioModel();
51 p.Titol = TxtBoxTitol.Text;
52 p.Contingut = TxtBoxCos.Text;
53 p.Data_p = DateTime.Now;
54 p.User_id = usuari.User_id;
55 PublicacioNegoci pNegoci = new PublicacioNegoci();
56 pNegoci.Publicacio = p;
57
58
59 // AFEGIM TAGS
60 string[] tags = TxtBoxEtiqueta.Text.Split(", ");
61 List<string> tagsList = new List<string>();
62 for (int i = 0; i < tags.Length; i++)
63 {
64 string formatat = TagNegoci.FormatarString(tags[i]);
65 if(!tagsList.Contains(formatat)) tagsList.Add(formatat);
66 }
67 pNegoci.Inserir(tagsList);
68
69 // NOTIFIQUEM A L'USUARI I OBRIR LA MAIN WINDOW
70 MessageBox.Show("El teu post s'ha publicat correctament!");
71 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(usuari);
72 main.Show();
73 this.Close();
74 }
80 private void TxtBoxTitol_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
81 {
82 if (placeholderTitol)
83 {
84 TxtBoxTitol.Text = string.Empty;
85 TxtBoxTitol.Foreground = Brushes.White;
86 placeholderTitol = false;
87 }
88 ComprovarButton();
89 }
95 private void TxtBoxTitol_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
96 {
97 ComprovarButton();
98 if (TxtBoxTitol.Text == string.Empty)
99 {
100 TxtBoxTitol.Text = "TÍTOL";
101 TxtBoxTitol.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
102 placeholderTitol = true;
103 }
104 }
110 private void TxtBoxCos_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
111 {
112 if (placeholderContingut)
113 {
114 TxtBoxCos.Text = string.Empty;
115 TxtBoxCos.Foreground = Brushes.White;
116 placeholderContingut = false;
117 }
118 ComprovarButton();
119 }
125 private void TxtBoxCos_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
126 {
127 ComprovarButton();
128 if (TxtBoxCos.Text == string.Empty)
129 {
130 TxtBoxCos.Text = "Escriu la teva publicació aquí";
131 TxtBoxCos.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
132 placeholderContingut = true;
133 }
134 }
140 private void TxtBoxEtiqueta_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
141 {
142 if (placeholderEtiquetes)
143 {
144 TxtBoxEtiqueta.Text = string.Empty;
145 TxtBoxEtiqueta.Foreground = Brushes.White;
146 placeholderEtiquetes = false;
147 }
148 ComprovarButton();
149 }
155 private void TxtBoxEtiqueta_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
156 {
157 ComprovarButton();
158 if (TxtBoxEtiqueta.Text == string.Empty)
159 {
160 TxtBoxEtiqueta.Text = "etiqueta1, etiqueta2, etiqueta3...";
161 TxtBoxEtiqueta.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
162 placeholderEtiquetes = true;
163 }
164 }
168 private void ComprovarButton()
169 {
170 if ((!(placeholderContingut || placeholderEtiquetes || placeholderTitol)) && TxtBoxCos.Text != string.Empty && TxtBoxEtiqueta.Text != string.Empty && TxtBoxTitol.Text != string.Empty)
171 {
172 BtnPublicar.IsEnabled = true;
173 }
174 else BtnPublicar.IsEnabled = false;
175 }
181 private void Escriure(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)
182 {
183 if (IsInitialized)
184 ComprovarButton();
185 }
191 private void BtnCancelar_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
192 {
193 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(usuari);
194 main.Show();
195 this.Close();
196 }
197 }
198}
